name: Echo Lost
description:
Echo Lost makes you take the role of Koko, a bat lost in a cavern trying to find their way home. This is especially hard for Koko as, because they're a bat, they're blind! Use Koko's echolocation to navigate the cavern and escape!

Use WASD or arrow keys to move.
Use Spacebar or W to jump.
Use the left mouse button to shoot a rock.
Press E to interact with levers (triangles).
Press P to pause.
Controls are currently unchangeable (sorry!)
